purpose: To provide a flexible and extensible framework for building, deploying, and managing AI agents across various applications
principle: Built on a modular architecture using TypeScript, allowing easy integration and customization of agent behaviors and capabilities
reusability: Offers a plugin system for extending agent capabilities, REST API for integration with other systems, and support for custom modules
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with limited documentation, may have stability issues and incomplete features
name: athena-core
highlight: General-purpose AI agent framework for creating and managing intelligent agents
